item.title: Keycloak With Docker Compose
item.description: Keycloak is an open source Identity and Access Management System developed as a JBoss community project under the stewardship of Red Hat. Keycloak makes it is easy to secure apps and services written in many technologies using a large number client libraries. Out of the box, we get things like Single Sign-On, Identity Brokering and Social Login, User Federation and Authorization Services. With little to no code, we can give users of our apps the ability to sign in with Identity Providers like GitHub, Twitter or Google.
